name: Master Skewb
description: A more complex version of Skewb. Similarily to a regular Skewb, it rotates around corners rather than faces as the standard Rubik's cube. It has 3 layers - we could compare regular Skewb to a 2x2 and Master Skewb to 3x3. An extra difficulty level is added, but it is not that difficult to learn if you know normal Skewb.

name: Megaminx
description: 3x3 Rubik's cube in the shape of a Dodecahedron. It is more complex, but it can be solved using algorithms from a normal Rubik's cube - therefore, there is no significant increase in the difficulty.

name: Skewb
description: An interesting cube that rotates around corners, unlike a normal Rubik's cube that rotates around edges. Very simple and fast to learn and to solve.
